Class TurfMisc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.commons.turf.TurfMisc

  • public class TurfMisc
extends java.lang.Object
    Class contains all the miscellaneous methods that Turf can perform.
    Since:
    1.2.0

      • lineSlice

        public static LineString lineSlice(Point startPt,
                                   Point stopPt,
                                   Feature line)
                            throws TurfException
        Takes a line, a start Point, and a stop point and returns the line in between those points.
        Parameters:
        startPt - Starting point.
        stopPt - Stopping point.
        line - Line to slice.
        Returns:
        Sliced line.
        Throws:
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.2.0
        See Also:
        Turf Line slice documentation

      • pointOnLine

        public static Feature pointOnLine(Point pt,
                                  java.util.List<Position> coords)
                           throws TurfException
        Takes a Point and a LineString and calculates the closest Point on the LineString.
        Parameters:
        pt - point to snap from
        coords - line to snap to
        Returns:
        closest point on the line to point
        Throws:
        TurfException - signals that a Turf exception of some sort has occurred.
        Since:
        1.3.0
